name: Mind the Gap
description:
Control your explorer as he plummets through the Earth. Can you make it safely out?

This is the entry of Ryan Nielson and Matthew Stones for Ludum Dare 29, April 2014.

NOTE: There seem to be an issue with the Unity web player currently in Chrome. To fix this play in another browser, or switch to a different tab and back again after the game is loaded.

NOTE #2: This hasn't been tested in full screen or any other resolutions, so your experience may vary.
